assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Broad informed consent from Biobank participants has given the Estonian Genome Center permission for continuous updates of epidemiologic data through periodical linking to central electronic health record (EHR) databases and local hospital information systems [CitationRef removed]. The study was conducted in accordance with good ethical standards, and was approved by the Ethics Committee of the University of Tartu (protocol nr 234/T-12).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
